actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1739 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to authorize limited local action on water resources under the jurisdiction of the Corps of Engineers.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development
subjects_top_term: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1976 to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to enable the engineering officer in charge of each district to certify that flood control improvements are compatible with local improvement projects then under study.

titles.title: A bill to authorize limited local action on water resources under the jurisdiction of the Corps of Engineers.
